title: BS! Teaser
description: The Veeco Productions Guide to a Perfect Night In: For dinner, indulge into a big serving of creamy beef stroganoff. For dessert, crush some nuts and begin sprinkling them atop a delicious banana split. After hours, sit on your brown sofa in front of your big screen and watch the brilliant shredding of Dusty Payne, Mitch Coleborn, Alex Gray, Nate Tyler, Andrew Doheny and more... in Veeco Productions latest surf feature entitled BS! *If your excitement lasts for more than 4 hours, read yourself a bedtime story and you'll be sleepin' in no time.

asset.author: Volcom
